entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -9.3°C
entry.summary:

entry.title: Wednesday night: Light snow. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Light snow ending this evening then mainly cloudy. Wind southwest 30 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 14 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries or rain showers. High plus 3.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the afternoon with flurries and rain showers. Wind southwest 20 km/h. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries or rain showers. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Flurries ending late in the evening then partly cloudy. Rain showers early in the evening. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 15 February 2023
